TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 允許組件由部分信任程式碼呼叫。

span.span: Allows an assembly to be called by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 如果少了這項宣告，則只有完全受信任的呼叫端才能使用該組件。

span.span: Without this declaration, only fully trusted callers are able to use the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]導入了新的安全性規則的行為會影響屬性 (請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md))。The [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] introduces new security rules that affect the behavior of the attribute (see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)). 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，所有的程式碼預設為安全性透明，也就是說，部分信任的。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], all code defaults to security-transparent, that is, partially trusted. 不過，您可以加上註解個別的型別和成員，以將它們指派其他透明度屬性。However, you can annotate individual types and members to assign them other transparency attributes. 這和其他安全性變更，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For this and other security changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md). .NET framework 2.0 版 （） 的組件必須是強式名稱來有效地使用(APTCA) 屬性。.NET Framework version 2.0 () assemblies must be strong-named to effectively use the (APTCA) attribute. [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] （） 的組件就不需要強式名稱的 APTCA 屬性才有效，而且可以包含透明、 安全性關鍵和安全性安全關鍵程式碼。 () assemblies do not have to be strong-named for the APTCA attribute to be effective, and they can contain transparent, security-critical and security-safe-critical code. 如需有關在組件層級套用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[套用屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md)。For more information about applying attributes at the assembly level, see [Applying Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md). 根據預設，強式名稱，如果組件不會明確套用這個組件層級的屬性，它可以呼叫只能由完全信任授與其他組件。By default, if a strong-named, assembly does not explicitly apply this attribute at the assembly level, it can be called only by other assemblies that are granted full trust. 這項限制會放入強制執行如`FullTrust`上每個公用或受保護的方法，在組件中的每個可公開存取類別上。This restriction is enforced by placing a for `FullTrust` on every public or protected method on every publicly accessible class in the assembly. 用於部分信任程式碼呼叫的組件可以宣告使用及其意圖。Assemblies that are intended to be called by partially trusted code can declare their intent through the use of . 在 C# 中宣告的範例是`[assembly:AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers]`; 在 Visual Basic 中的範例是``。An example of the declaration in C# is `[assembly:AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers]`; an example in Visual Basic is ``. > [!CAUTION] > 這個組件層級屬性的存在可防止放置的預設行為`FullTrust`安全性檢查，而讓任何其他 （部分或完全信任） 的組件中的可呼叫的組件。The presence of this assembly-level attribute prevents the default behavior of placing `FullTrust` security checks, and makes the assembly callable from any other (partially or fully trusted) assembly. APTCA 屬性存在時，所有其他安全性檢查函式如預期般，包括任何存在的類別層級或是方法層級宣告式安全性屬性。When the APTCA attribute is present, all other security checks function as intended, including any class-level or method-level declarative security attributes that are present. 這個屬性會封鎖隱含、 完全信任呼叫端要求。This attribute blocks only the implicit, fully trusted caller demand. 這不是宣告式安全性屬性，但一般屬性 (其衍生自，不是從)。This is not a declarative security attribute, but a regular attribute (it derives from , not from ). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 類別。The following example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/CPP/AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/CS/AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/VB/allowpartiallytrustedcallersattribute.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該只能在組件層級套用。This attribute should be applied only at the assembly level. ## Examples 如需如何使用這個建構函式的範例，請參閱所提供的程式碼範例類別。For an example of how to use this constructor, see the code example provided for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel PartialTrustVisibilityLevel { System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel get(); void set(System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定標記為 (APTCA) 屬性之程式碼的預設部分信任可視性。

span.span: Gets or sets the default partial trust visibility for code that is marked with the (APTCA) attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性。The following examples demonstrate how to use this property. - 預設值，無條件 APTCA:Default, unconditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers] ``` 預設值為 。Defaults to . - 明確、 無條件 APTCA:Explicit, unconditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers(PartialTrustVisibilityLevel=VisibleToAllHosts)] ``` 組件一律能透過部分信任程式碼呼叫。The assembly can always be called by partial-trust code. - 明確、 條件式 APTCA:Explicit, conditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers(PartialTrustVisibilityLevel=NotVisibleByDefault)] ``` 組件具有尚未稽核對於部分信任，但是它看不到預設部分信任程式碼。The assembly has been audited for partial trust, but it is not visible to partial-trust code by default. 若要對部分信任程式碼顯示組件，請將它加入 屬性中。To make the assembly visible to partial-trust code, add it to the property.
